text: Texarkana Arkansas School District No. 7 (TASD7) is a school district in Texarkana, Arkansas, and currently has 7 schools. (1 high school, 2 middle schools, and 4 elementary schools) == Schools == === High Schools === Arkansas High School (9 - 12) === Middle Schools === Arkansas Middle School (6 - 8) === Elementary Schools === * Fairview Elementary School (1 - 5) * Trice Elementary School (1 - 5) * Kilpatrick Elementary School (1 - 5) * Union Elementary School (1 - 5) == References == == Other websites == *Official Website Category:School districts in the United States
title: Texarkana Arkansas School District
